column4: hi there. ran into a little problem. when I try to delete files from partition #2 (ntfs) it disappears from the folders, but the drive-size stays on 16,7gig and the files don't show in the trash bin. got any hints?

hi there. ran into a little problem. when I try to delete files from partition #2 (ntfs) it disappears from the folders, but the free partition-size stays on 16,7gig and the files don't show in the trash bin. got any hints?
